message: Hello Bob! I have an exclusive product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $20000. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice! Thank you for the offer, but $20000 is beyond my budget. I can offer you $8000 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest, but $8000 is too low for me. How about I lower my price slightly to $18000? Let me know if that works for you.
Hi Alice! I understand your position, but $18000 is still more than I can afford. I can offer $9000, which is within my budget. I hope we can make this deal happen.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob! However, $9000 is still too low for the value of the product. How about I meet you in the middle at $17000? Let me know if this works for you.
